roleset.name: physical smearing of a substance on a surface

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: And “schmear” is a Yiddish word that originally referred to the spread of cream cheese on a bagel ..

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on spread-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls spray-9.7-1.

roleset.name: extend

example.name: just arg1
example.text: successful developments and marketing of this new medicine would help prevent the spread of Diabetes II in such developing countries as China , India and Africa , etc .
example.note: (in this tree, the LOC is outside the noun-span)

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on spread-v.02. Corresponds to VNcls appear-48.1.1, entity_specific_modes_being-47.2.

roleset.name: cause to be widely located or distributed
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on spread-v.03.
